pages.title: Preparations
pages.text: For your first $(#033dfc)Vault$(), you should prepare a few things.$(br2)You should have enchanted armor. $(br)$(o)(Note that Vanilla armor has been nerfed)$()$(br)You should bring ways of healing yourself, as previously mentioned, your health$(#f00)$(l) will not naturally regenerate$() and a way to store all the goodies you will be finding.

The Vault will have a $(#f00)$(l)25 minute Timer$() by default, so you cannot stay as long as you'd like. Once this timer hits 0, $(#f00)$(l)you will be unalived$().$(br2)In addition to that, it is recommended to bring plenty of food, blocks, and a way to mark the Vault Portal if you cannot complete the Vault, which you may use the Waypoints feature for that $(#033dfc)Xaeros World Map$() provides you with.
